attributes.action: Allow school pupils and teachers to dress as a book character every day.
attributes.background: Children become inspired on book day and share their love of their favorite characters, be they from book, film or television. Everyday would be more fun and classrooms more colourful.

rejection.details:
Decisions about dress codes for pupils and teachers are for a school's governing body and management to take.

You could ask your school's governing body to take the action you want to see in your school.
